title: Larsa Pippen wears black fringed minidress at Drake's birthday party
text:
She started from the bottom and now she's here.

And Larsa Pippen made sure to pull out all the stops for Drake's 33rd birthday party in Los Angeles on Wednesday night.

The 45-year-old reality vet flaunted her hourglass frame in a black fringed mini dress for the star-studded soiree just days after trolls branded her a 'spotlight seeking groupie' on Keeping Up With The Kardashians.

Bombshell: Larsa Pippen made sure to pull out all the stops for Drake's 33rd birthday party in Los Angeles on Wednesday night

Larsa's tanned and toned legs took center stage as she walked into the bash at Goya studios wearing a tiny black dress paired with sparkling heels.

Her ample assets were barely contained in the low-cut top and wore a diamond chain around her neck.

Pippen sported a single black glove with a diamond bracelet, and wore her honey-hued hair straight past her shoulders.

Yikes: The 45-year-old reality vet flaunted her hourglass frame in a black fringed mini dress for the star-studded soiree just days after trolls branded her a 'spotlight seeking groupie' on Keeping Up With The Kardashians

Walk it out: Larsa's tanned and toned legs took center stage as she walked into the bash at Goya studios wearing a tiny black dress paired with sparkling heels

Earlier this week, she gifted her best friend, Kim Kardashian, a diamond chain from Jadelle Beverly Hills.

She caught some slack during a recent KUWTK episode where she sparked a fight with Poosh COO Sarah Howard after she saw a woman crying in the bathroom.

'Who cares? It's not our fault. It's not our problem. I'm not trying to get to the bathroom and get in someone's business,' Pippen responded.

Appeal: Her ample assets were barely contained in the low-cut top and wore a diamond chain around her neck

A look: Pippen sported a single black glove with a diamond bracelet, and wore her honey-hued hair straight past her shoulders

'I'm sorry but I'm the caring friend. If I see someone crying, I'll be the first to ask them if they are ok,' a user commented on HollywoodUnlocked's Instagram.

But when another user commented: 'Why didn't she mind her business with Jordyn? Ran to the Hollywoodunblocked and TMZ. Spotlight seeking groupie,' that's when she got defensive.

'Actually babe, I'm the one who tried to stop the stories by telling my friends what was going down,' she wrote. 'They also have called me, told me things about my situation and that's what friends do!!! But I'm in another country watching a couple fight all night long like what does that have to do with us? We're drinking, enjoying my friend's bday trip. The house I wanted us to go to was my longtime friend's house.'
description: The reality vet flaunted her hourglass frame in a black fringed mini dress for the star-studded soiree just days after trolls branded her a 'spotlight seeking groupie' on Keeping Up With The Kardashians.
